attributes.action: Declare a national day of prayer for an end to the corona virus
attributes.additional_details: In past national emergencies governments would acknowledge that the wisdom of man was sometimes not enough to prevail and that it was right and proper to ask for the people of the county to pray to God for help. I believe this is such an emergency and it would be a sign of strength to take such a step
attributes.background: Set a date for a national day of prayer and encourage everyone to pray for divine help during this time of crisis and for the effects of the virus to be kept low

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
